data.lyric:
[ti:for him.]
[ar:Troye Sivan/Allday]
[al:Blue Neighbourhood (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]For him. - Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)/Allday
[00:03.81]Lyrics by：Bram Inscore/Brett McLaughlin/Troye Sivan Mellet/Alexandra Hughes/Tom Gaynor
[00:07.62]Composed by：Bram Inscore/Brett McLaughlin/Troye Sivan Mellet/Alexandra Hughes/Tom Gaynor
[00:11.43]We are runnin' so fast
[00:13.71]
[00:14.52]And we never look back
[00:17.25]And whatever I lack you make up
[00:20.79]
[00:23.12]We make a really good team
[00:26.02]And though not everyone sees
[00:28.98]We got this crazy chemistry
[00:31.18]
[00:32.13]Between us
[00:32.63]
[00:35.63]Jump starting your car cause this city's a bore
[00:38.44]Buying e-cigarettes at the convenience store
[00:40.82]
[00:41.36]Making new clichés on our own little tour
[00:44.37]Let's ride
[00:44.85]
[00:48.61]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[00:51.87]
[00:54.28]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[00:57.99]
[01:00.08]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[01:03.89]
[01:06.12]Sickeningly sweet like honey don't need money
[01:09.74]All I need is you
[01:12.83]
[01:15.89]All I need is you
[01:18.84]
[01:22.67]We try staying up late
[01:24.45]
[01:25.41]But we both are light weights
[01:27.67]
[01:28.38]Yeah we get off our face too easy
[01:31.51]
[01:34.26]And we take jokes way too far
[01:36.26]
[01:37.28]And sometimes living's too hard
[01:39.08]
[01:40.19]We're like two halves of one heart
[01:42.59]
[01:47.72]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[01:51.32]
[01:53.57]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[01:57.21]
[01:59.02]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[02:03.19]
[02:05.38]Sickeningly sweet like honey don't need money
[02:08.54]
[02:09.13]All I need is you
[02:12.03]
[02:15.17]All I need is you
[02:18.01]
[02:22.99]Eat a pill stay and chill you don't need to go
[02:25.62]I'm about to bring emo back if you leave my home
[02:28.40]I'd panic at the disco and you'd rather watch a TV show
[02:31.35]Then I'll squeeze your booty real hard like I'm kneading dough
[02:34.27]
[02:34.82]Pizza boy I'm speeding for ya
[02:37.55]We canna get married tonight if you really wanna
[02:40.51]Me in a cheap suit like a sleazy lawyer
[02:43.49]And if you break this lil' heart it'd be an honour
[02:46.14]
[02:46.91]You don't have to say I love you to say I love you
[02:50.40]
[02:52.88]Forget all the shooting stars and all the silver moons
[02:56.47]
[02:58.85]We've been making shades of purple out of red and blue
[03:02.27]
[03:04.64]Sickeningly sweet like honey don't need money
[03:07.71]
[03:08.32]All I need is you
[03:11.33]
[03:14.48]All I need is you
data.trans:
[ti:for him.]
[ar:Troye Sivan/Allday]
[al:Blue Neighbourhood (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.81]//
[00:07.62]//
[00:11.43]我们狂奔向前
[00:13.71]
[00:14.52]从不回望过去
[00:17.25]无论我有何缺失 你都会为我补足
[00:20.79]
[00:23.12]我们如此天造地设
[00:26.02]尽管没人看好
[00:28.98]我们依然爱得疯狂
[00:31.18]
[00:32.13]离不开彼此
[00:32.63]
[00:35.63]跳上你的车启动出发 逃离这令人生厌的城市
[00:38.44]在便利店买包香烟
[00:40.82]
[00:41.36]开展我们自己旅程的新篇章
[00:44.37]启程吧
[00:44.85]
[00:48.61]你甚至不用说 我爱你
[00:51.87]
[00:54.28]甚至可以忘记漫天流星和银辉月色
[00:57.99]
[01:00.08]你我筑起跨越红蓝之爱的紫色庇荫
[01:03.89]
[01:06.12]亲爱的 沉迷这如痴如醉的甜蜜 不计较任何物质条件
[01:09.74]我想要的只有你
[01:12.83]
[01:15.89]我想要的只有你
[01:18.84]
[01:22.67]我们试着整夜不眠
[01:24.45]
[01:25.41]而我们并非心事重重
[01:27.67]
[01:28.38]我们毫不费力的卸下面具 彼此坦诚
[01:31.51]
[01:34.26]我们放肆的开着各种玩笑
[01:36.26]
[01:37.28]尽管有时生活不易
[01:39.08]
[01:40.19]我们仍紧紧相伴
[01:42.59]
[01:47.72]你甚至不用说 我爱你
[01:51.32]
[01:53.57]甚至可以忘记漫天流星和银辉月色
[01:57.21]
[01:59.02]你我筑起跨越红蓝之爱的紫色庇荫
[02:03.19]
[02:05.38]亲爱的 沉迷这如痴如醉的甜蜜 不计较任何物质条件
[02:08.54]
[02:09.13]我想要的只有你
[02:12.03]
[02:15.17]我想要的只有你
[02:18.01]
[02:22.99]一起享受激情愉悦 你不要离开
[02:25.62]假若你离开我家 我会找人将你紧急召回
[02:28.40]我在舞池中惊慌失措 你却悠然享受电视节目
[02:31.35]于是我发疯地揉捏抚摸你的身体
[02:34.27]
[02:34.82]披萨男孩 我将飞快朝你前进
[02:37.55]如果你愿意 今晚我们就私定终身
[02:40.51]我穿着低廉的礼服像个潦倒的律师
[02:43.49]你不费吹灰之力就能击破我沦陷的心
[02:46.14]
[02:46.91]你甚至不用说 我爱你
[02:50.40]
[02:52.88]甚至可以忘记漫天流星和银辉月色
[02:56.47]
[02:58.85]你我筑起跨越红蓝之爱的紫色庇荫
[03:02.27]
[03:04.64]亲爱的 沉迷这如痴如醉的甜蜜 不计较任何物质条件
[03:07.71]
[03:08.32]我想要的只有你
[03:11.33]
[03:14.48]我想要的只有你
